original_title: The Cure - CURÆTION-25: From There to Here | From Here to There
overview: The concert was captured on the tenth and final night of the 25th Meltdown Festival (curated by Robert Smith) at London’s Royal Festival Hall in June 2018. The band performed a song from each of their 13 studio albums with new, unreleased songs at the core of the set, offering a glimpse into the bands’ future.
title: The Cure - CURÆTION-25: From There to Here | From Here to There
